title: Easy marinated mushrooms
ingredients: ['500g fresh mushrooms, such as chestnut or crimini, stemmed', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '3 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '2 cloves garlic, pounded', '4 tablespoons red onion, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons (packed) chopped fresh oregano', '2 tablespoons (packed) chopped fresh thyme', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']
